issues.info: @nwo5 on discord or github issues, complain about performance and the threat in readme applies to u ;3

trigger-indicators-only-selected.name: Only Selected
trigger-indicators-only-selected.description: only show indicators for selected triggers/objs

trigger-indicators-only-triggers.name: Only Triggers
trigger-indicators-only-triggers.description: only show trigger to trigger connections

trigger-indicators-only-spawn.name: Only Spawn
trigger-indicators-only-spawn.description: only triggers only show spawn connected triggers instead of all triggers with that id

trigger-indicators-max-distance.name: Max Distance
trigger-indicators-max-distance.description: max distance between objects to draw indicators (without selecting)

trigger-indicators-group-blacklist.name: Group Blacklist
trigger-indicators-group-blacklist.description: you can input more groups like, '1,2,3,4,5'

trigger-indicators-trigger-blacklist.name: Trigger Blacklist
trigger-indicators-trigger-blacklist.description: you can input more trigger ids like, '1,2,3,4,5'

trigger-indicators-cluster-objects-size.name: Max Object Cluster Distance
trigger-indicators-cluster-objects-size.description: when clustering, any neighbours further than this will form their own cluster instead of joining one

trigger-indicators-cluster-triggers-size.name: Max Trigger Cluster Distance
trigger-indicators-cluster-triggers-size.description: when clustering, any neighbours further than this will form their own cluster instead of joining one

trigger-indicators-cluster-objects-max-t.name: Object Clusters Max Threshold
trigger-indicators-cluster-objects-max-t.description: maximum amount of objects for clustering, any more and fallback gets used (dont set to a high number 1k == 1 mil calls worse case sowwy not sowwy that my cluster implementation is on^2 anything more and its too much for me to understand :3c)

trigger-indicators-cluster-triggers-max-.name: Trigger Clusters Max Threshold
trigger-indicators-cluster-triggers-max-.description: maximum amount of triggers for clustering, any more and fallback gets used (dont set to a high number 1k == 1 mil calls worse case sowwy not sowwy that my cluster implementation is on^2 anything more and its too much for me to understand :3c)

trigger-indicators-cluster-fallback-indi.name: Object Clusters Falback To Individual Lines
trigger-indicators-cluster-fallback-indi.description: if cluster threshold is exceeded fallback to indivudal lines to every object instead of one big rect

trigger-indicators-cluster-fallback-indi.name: Trigger Clusters Falback To Individual Lines
trigger-indicators-cluster-fallback-indi.description: if cluster threshold is exceeded fallback to indivudal lines to every trigger instead of one big rect

trigger-indicators-scale-with-zoom.name: Scale With Zoom
trigger-indicators-scale-with-zoom.description: dynamic thickness based on editor zoom

trigger-indicators-box-line-objects.name: Object Individual Line Box
trigger-indicators-box-line-objects.description: draw rect around object for individual lines

trigger-indicators-box-line-triggers.name: Trigger Individual Line Box
trigger-indicators-box-line-triggers.description: draw rect around object for individual lines

trigger-indicators-cull-distance-multipl.name: Cull Distance Multiplier
trigger-indicators-cull-distance-multipl.description: less cull distance which is prolly bad unless u want selected objects to show their triggers from further idk :3c

trigger-indicators-selected-cull-distanc.name: Select Cull Distance Multiplier
trigger-indicators-selected-cull-distanc.description: yeah so cuz selecting objects negates max distance but triggers still get culled, cull distance is decreased when selecting :3c u can disable or change that here ig idk rawr

better-duration-lines-inline-previews.name: Inline Previews
better-duration-lines-inline-previews.description: previews color and opacity change inline, and some other things

better-duration-lines-zoom-clamp.name: Zoom Clamp
better-duration-lines-zoom-clamp.description: any zoom past this wont shrink duration lines w/ scale w/ zoom

better-duration-lines-trigger-blacklist.name: Trigger Blacklist
better-duration-lines-trigger-blacklist.description: you can input more trigger ids like, '1,2,3,4,5'

move-indicators-indicators-by-default.name: Enable Indicators By Default
move-indicators-indicators-by-default.description: automatically turn on move indicators on placed triggers

move-indicators-end-preview-by-default.name: Enable End Preview By Default
move-indicators-end-preview-by-default.description: automatically turn on end preview on placed triggers (sh*t gets laggy fast dont do this :sob:)

move-indicators-preview-easing.name: Preview Easing
move-indicators-preview-easing.description: easing isnt *real* btw its just an inline visualization of the easing, easing is just how far along a line u should be at in a certain time so an accurate visualization would just be a straight line

move-indicators-cluster-size.name: Cluster Size
move-indicators-cluster-size.description: when clustering, any neighbours further than this will form their own cluster instead of joining one

move-indicators-cluster-max-threshold.name: Cluster Max Threshold
move-indicators-cluster-max-threshold.description: maximum amount of objects for clustering, any more and fallback gets used (dont set to a high number 1k == 1 mil calls worse case sowwy not sowwy that my cluster implementation is on^2 anything more and its too much for me to understand :3c)

move-indicators-cluster-fallback.name: Cluster Fallback
move-indicators-cluster-fallback.description: if cluster threshold is exceeded fallback to this

move-indicators-scale-with-zoom.name: Scale With Zoom
move-indicators-scale-with-zoom.description: dynamic thickness based on editor zoom

move-indicators-center-indicator-col.name: Center Indicator Color
move-indicators-center-indicator-col.description: sooo the position of indicators are calculated based on *roughly* all movements the object wouldve done up until the point its at, this just draws a line from the indicator start to the actual center in the editor

area-previews-previews-by-default.name: Enable Previews By Default
area-previews-previews-by-default.description: automatically turn on area previews on placed triggers

better-particles-primary-col-for-center-.name: Use Primary Color For Center Lines

better-particles-scale-with-zoom.name: Scale With Zoom
better-particles-scale-with-zoom.description: dynamic thickness based on editor zoom

general-settings-button-texture.name: Settings Button Texture
general-settings-button-texture.description: yes you have only pride flags, be gay force, it on everyone, dont like it, homophobic, :3

general-layer-alpha-multiplier.name: Layer Alpha Multiplier
general-layer-alpha-multiplier.description: how much to fade smth drawn thats not on ur layer

silly-sayo-device-sensitivity.name: Sayo Device Sensitivity
silly-sayo-device-sensitivity.description: new hardest acu 100% cbf 240hz sayo solid wave trail uldm jump from time machine first victor on the iss
